headline: How Philip Morris International’s (PM) Regulatory Push and Manufacturing Investment Could Shape Its U.S. Smoke-Free Future
summary: Philip Morris International recently presented evidence to the FDA's Tobacco Products Scientific Advisory Committee to support the continued marketing of its IQOS heated tobacco devices as modified risk tobacco products in the U.S., while also expanding its U.S. manufacturing facilities for new smoke-free consumables. This regulatory engagement and manufacturing investment reflect the company's commitment to driving its smoke-free transformation and strengthening its position in the evolving...
